TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program - The Best, yet most confusing, Game ever?

Articles.Content:
Hello everybody! ImBured, and I'm a gamer. I like doing videos that range from Giveaways, Gameplays, to Tutorials, Let's Plays, and Montages! Steam games, to online games, to every other game suggested to me . So make sure to check me out. But enough advertising, I don't think that's allowed. The reason I posted that, was because it seemed like a good intro my newest video, and first post on this forum. So, without further a due, here it is.

So, in this video I basically try Kerbal Space Program out for the first time. It's pretty difficult to understand, but hey, I'll get used to it. I'm hoping to do some more of these. Please like, subscribe, comment.. All of that crazy shiz miz. It actually helps. So yea, thanks. Hope you enjoy.

It would help to try the tutorials, other wise you are just wasting your time

Your review wasn't worth watching, since it only showed you failing time after time.
